instruction: Collect 5 relevant sources to support an argument.
input: Argument: Increased use of robots in manufacturing will result in more efficient production.
output:
Sources: 

1. “Robots and Automation in Manufacturing.” ScienceDirect, Elsevier, www.sciencedirect.com/topics/engineering/robots-and-automation-in-manufacturing.

2. “Robotics in Manufacturing: Productivity and Quality in Focus.” Robotics Business Review, Tech-Clarity, 10 Sept. 2019, roboticsbusinessreview.com/manufacturing/robotics-in-manufacturing-productivity-and-quality-in-focus/.

3. Goyanes, José Jaime. “Robots in Manufacturing: Automation Revolutionizes Manufacturing Processes.” Humble Robotics, Humble Robots, 29 July 2019, www.humblerobotics.com/articles/automation-revolutionizes-manufacturing-processes.php.

4. Morrell, Ryan. “Robots and Automation: What’s Next?” cnet.com, 5 Dec. 2016, www.cnet.com/how-to/robots-and-automation-whats-next/.

5. Manuel, Mary Catherine. “Robots & Automation in Manufacturing: Automation Improves Product Quality.” RoboticsTomorrow, Robotics Tomorrow, 21 July 2017, www.robotstomorrow.com/article/detail/robots-automation-in-manufacturing-automation-improves-product-quality.
